metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32545 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in ImageMagick, causing an outside the range of representable values of type 'unsigned char' at coders/psd.c, when crafted or untrusted input is processed. This leads to a negative impact to application availability or other problems related to undefined behavior.

notes.Note: iconstantin> the patch for this CVE also addresses CVE-2021-40211

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
